original_text: David went to Ziklag town because King Saul, the son of Kish, had chased him away. Many brave men went to David there. They were some of the brave soldiers who helped David to fight in war. Chronicles 11 Chronicles 13
korean_text: 다윗이 기스의 아들 사울로 말미암아 시글락에 숨어 있을 때에 그에게 와서 싸움을 도운 용사 중에 든 자가 있었으니

sentences.original_text: because King Saul, the son of Kish, had chased him away
sentences.korean_translation: 기스의 아들 사울 왕이 그를 쫓아냈기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: Many brave men went to David there
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 용감한 사람들이 그곳에서 다윗에게로 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: They were some of the brave soldiers
who helped David to fight in war
